settings.info: Upload the font file to Shopify admin > Content > Files. The file name must not have any spaces, hyphens, underscores etc.

settings.info: Doesn't have to be identical to file name, just unique.

settings.label: Display the Continue shopping button link when the cart is empty
Continue shopping button custom link
settings.info: If empty, a link to all products will be applied.

settings.label: Display compare prices based on
settings.info: Determines how the displayed compare prices of the items are caluclated. If "Cart discounts" is selected, compare prices won't be displayed unless there is a Product discount for the item. "Real product compare price" displays the compare price as item quantity * real product compare price. "Automatic" is the combination of the first two options. If an automatic discount is active, that's going to be displayed. Otherwise, the real compare price of the product will be taken into calculation.

settings.label: Display discounted single item prices
settings.info: Displays a price of a single item with a discount badge (under the title) if a Product discount is applied.

settings.label: Displayed variants style
settings.info: Example for Classic: Color: Green, Size: S. Example for compact: Green / S

settings.label: Custom payment badges to show
settings.info: List of payments you want to show, split with a comma. Options are: afterpay, american_express, apple_pay, bitcoin, dankort, diners_club, discover, dogecoin, dwolla, facebook_pay, forbrugsforeningen, google_pay, ideal, jcb, klarna, klarna-pay-later, litecoin, maestro, master, paypal, shopify_pay, sofort, unionpay, visa

settings.label: t:settings_schema.cart.settings.cart_drawer.collection.label
settings.info: t:settings_schema.cart.settings.cart_drawer.collection.info

settings.content: Use the cart progress bar for shipping or other cart promotions. The progress bar will show a success message once the customer reaches the set goal. Make sure to set up an [automatic discount](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/discounts/automatic-discounts).

settings.label: Base the goal on
settings.info: Determines if the goal will be based on the total cart subtotal price, or the total quantity of items added to cart.

settings.label: Progress bar goal
settings.info: This should be the required cart sub-total for the promotion.

settings.label: Progress bar message
settings.default: Spend [amount] more to get FREE shipping!
settings.info: Use '[amount]' to display the amount needed to reach the goal.

settings.label: Hide upsell if product is in cart
Upsell #1 Description
settings.default: Write a short description about your upsell product to attract customers
